column4: hi, i'm with a problem since i've installed the 2.6.11 kernel through synaptic that i can't configure my graphics card properly cause theres no cards listed on the xorgcfg utility, even editing the xorg.conf file manualy and puting there 1280x1024 it changes the file back to 1600x1200, anyone knows anything bout this ??!?!
yes i'm in 2.6.10 now but its giving me the same error
